import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; class Books extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.booksArr); return (
{this.props.booksArr.length && this.props.booksArr.map((book, idx) => (

{book.bookTitle}

{book.bookDescription}

{book.bookStatus}

 ))}
First slide label

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue mollis interdum.

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.
); } } export default Books;
